channel.title: David Wojnarowicz on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in David Wojnarowicz on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Livin' on the Edge
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: That sound you hear is Tipper Gore’s eyes bulging out. On June 1, a new video game called Hatred aims for the absolute edge of decency and taste, with a plot line that essentially involves killing innocent people en masse for no good reason other than to push forth the destruction of society. “We say ‘yes, it is a game about killing people’ and the only reason of the antagonist doing that sick stuff is his deep-rooted hatred,“ its makers state.
